onboarding.title: Welcome to MetaMask
onboarding.subtitle: A browser that connects you to applications on the decentralized web

create_wallet.title: Creating your new wallet
create_wallet.subtitle: Sit tight while we do some hard math! You will use your wallet to login & interact securely with decentralized applications

import_wallet.title: Import Wallet
import_wallet.sync_help: Sync your wallet with the extension

choose_password.title: Create password
choose_password.subtitle: You'll use this password to unlock your MetaMask wallet only on this device.
choose_password.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 chars long
choose_password.security_alert_message: In order to proceed, you need to turn Passcode on or any biometrics authentication method supported in your device (FaceID, TouchID or Fingerprint)

import_from_seed.title: Import from seed
import_from_seed.password_length_error: The password needs to be at least 8 chars long
import_from_seed.seed_word_count_error: The seed needs to be 12 words

drawer.submit_feedback_message: Choose the type of feedback to send.
drawer.logout_title: Do you really want to log out?

wallet.title: Wallet
wallet.remove_token_title: Do you want to remove this token?
wallet.remove_collectible_title: Do you want to remove this collectible?

token.address_must_be_valid: Token address must be a valid address.

collectible.address_must_be_valid: Collectible address must be a valid address.
collectible.address_must_be_smart_contract: Personal address detected. Input the collectible contract address.
collectible.ownership_error: You are not the owner of this collectible, so you can't add it.

app_settings.title: Settings
app_settings.auto_lock_desc: Choose the amount of time before the application automatically locks.
app_settings.state_logs_desc: This will help MetaMask debug any issue you might encounter. Please send it via email to mobile@metamask.io
app_settings.clear_approvals_modal_message: All dapps will need to request access to view account information again.
app_settings.clear_browser_history_modal_message: We are about to remove all your browser history. Are you sure?
app_settings.reset_account_modal_message: Resetting your account will clear your transaction history.
app_settings.invalid_rpc_prefix: URIs require the appropriate HTTPS prefix
app_settings.sync_with_extension_desc: This will import all extension accounts to this device.
app_settings.privacy_mode_desc: Websites must request access to view your account information.
app_settings.show_hex_data_desc: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen.
app_settings.advanced_desc: Access developer features, Reset Account, setup testnets and custom RPC
app_settings.security_desc: Privacy settings, private key and wallet seed phrase
app_settings.conversion_desc: Display fiat values in using a specific currency throughout the application.
app_settings.language_desc: Translate the application to a different supported language.
app_settings.engine_desc: Change the default search engine used when entering search terms in the URL bar.
app_settings.reset_desc: This action will clear your transaction history. This data might not be retrievable.
app_settings.rpc_desc: Use a custom RPC-capable network via URL instead of one of the provided networks.
app_settings.hex_desc: Select this to show the hex data field on the send screen.
app_settings.clear_privacy_desc: Clear privacy data so all websites must request access to view account information again.
app_settings.clear_history_desc: Choose this option to clear your entire browsing history.

reveal_credential.seed_phrase_explanation: If you ever change browsers or move computers, you will need this seed phrase to access your accounts. Save them somewhere safe and secret.
reveal_credential.private_key_explanation: Save it somewhere safe and secret.
reveal_credential.private_key_warning: This is the private key for the current selected account: {{accountName}}. Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private keys can take steal any assets held in your account.
reveal_credential.seed_phrase_warning_explanation: DO NOT share this phrase with anyone! These words can be used to steal all your accounts.
reveal_credential.private_key_warning_explanation: Never disclose this key. Anyone with your private keys can take steal any assets held in your account.
reveal_credential.unknown_error: Couldn't unlock your account. Please try again.
reveal_credential.seed_warning: This is your wallet's 12 word phrase. This is a very sensitive phrase. DO NOT SHARE THIS WITH ANYONE.

qr_scanner.invalid_qr_code_message: The QR code that you are trying to scan it is not valid.
qr_scanner.allow_camera_dialog_message: We need your permission to scan QR codes

custom_gas.warning_gas_limit: Gas limit must be greater than 20999 and less than 7920027

home_page.backup_alert_message: Tap to save your seed phrase
home_page.no_bookmarks: You have no favorites Dapps yet
home_page.remove_bookmark_title: Do you want to remove this site from your favorites?

browser.title: Browser
browser.dapp_browser_message: MetaMask is your wallet and browser for the decentralized web. Have a look around!

sync_with_extension.title: Sync data from Extension
sync_with_extension.label: Open the MetaMask extension in your desktop browser, then go to settings, click on "Sync with Mobile" and then enter your password to see the QR Code
sync_with_extension.please_wait: Please wait while we sync your data...
sync_with_extension.error_message: Something went wrong... Please try again
sync_with_extension.warning_message: This will override all your current accounts and transaction history in your mobile phone. Are you sure?

sync_with_extension_success.title: Sync completed
sync_with_extension_success.sync_complete: We have synchronized all the information from your MetaMask extension and now you're ready to go!

networks.title: Networks
networks.status_not_ok: The network is having some issues

authentication.auth_prompt_desc: Please authenticate in order to use MetaMask
authentication.fingerprint_prompt_desc: Use your fingerprint to unlock MetaMask

accountApproval.title: CONNECT REQUEST
accountApproval.warning: By clicking connect, you allow this dapp to view your public address. This is an important security step to protect your data from potential phishing risks.

import_private_key.title: Import Account
import_private_key.description_one: Imported accounts are viewable in your wallet but are not recoverable with your MetaMask seed phrase.
import_private_key.learn_more_here: Learn more about imported accounts here.
import_private_key.subtitle: Paste your private key string
import_private_key.error_message: We couldn't import that private key. Please make sure you entered it correctly.
import_private_key.error_empty_message: You need to enter your private key.

import_private_key_success.title: Account succesfully imported!
import_private_key_success.description_one: You'll be now able to view your account in MetaMask.

secure_your_wallet.title: Secure your wallet
secure_your_wallet.info_text_1: Take a few moments to finish setting up your MetaMask wallet.
secure_your_wallet.info_text_2: This will ensure only you can access your funds and will let you recover your wallet if you lose your device

account_backup_step_1.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your seed phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_1.title: Save your wallet's seed phrase
account_backup_step_1.info_text_2_3: code that you do NOT share with anyone.
account_backup_step_1.info_text_3_3: in case you lose your device, forget your password, have to re-install the MetaMask app or want to access your wallet on another device.

account_backup_step_2.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your seed phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_2.title: Grab a pen and paper
account_backup_step_2.info: Next step is to write your seed phrase down.

account_backup_step_3.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your seed phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_3.title: Is anyone watching?
account_backup_step_3.info_text: Make sure no other human or robot is watching your screen. If your seed phrase is copied, it can be used on other devices to steal your funds

account_backup_step_4.cancel_backup_message: We highly recommend you save your seed phrase in order to restore your wallet.
account_backup_step_4.title: Your seed phrase
account_backup_step_4.info_text_1: Carefully write down these words on paper. Their order matters.
account_backup_step_4.info_text_2: You'll be asked to re-enter it on the next screen
account_backup_step_4.before_continiuing: Before continuing we need you to confirm your password

account_backup_step_5.error_message: The order of the words is incorrect. Please make sure you wrote it down correctly and go to the previous screen if it is necessary
account_backup_step_5.title: Confirm seed phrase
account_backup_step_5.info_text: Insert each word in the order it was presented to you on the previous screen.
account_backup_step_5.modal_text: This was to ensure you follow this security measure

account_backup_step_6.title: Security Tips
account_backup_step_6.info_text: MetaMask cannot recover your seed phrase if you lose it
account_backup_step_6.tip_1: Keep multiple backups of your seed phrase
account_backup_step_6.tip_2: Store the phrase in a trusted password manager and paper backups in a safe place
account_backup_step_6.tip_3: Never share this phrase with anyone
account_backup_step_6.disclaimer: * You can find your seedphrase if you go to
account_backup_step_6.modal_text: You are all backed up and ready to go!

phishing.intro: is currently on the MetaMask domain warning list. This means that based on information available to us, MetaMask believes this domain could currently compromise your security and, as an added safety feature, MetaMask has restricted access to the site. To override this, please read the rest of this warning for instructions on how to continue at your own risk.
phishing.reasons: There are many reasons sites can appear on our warning list, and our warning list compiles from other widely used industry lists. Such reasons can include known fraud or security risks, such as domains that test positive on the
phishing.list_content: Domains on these warning lists may include outright malicious websites and legitimate websites that have been compromised by a malicious actor.
phishing.to_read_more: To read more about this site
phishing.review_on_etherscam: please review the domain on Etherscam.
phishing.warning: Note that this warning list is compiled on a voluntary basis. This list may be inaccurate or incomplete. Just because a domain does not appear on this list is not an implicit guarantee of that domain's safety. As always, your transactions are your own responsibility. If you wish to interact with any domain on our warning list, you can do so by
phishing.file_an_issue_intro: If you think this domain is incorrectly flagged or if a blocked legitimate website has resolved its security issues,

secure_your_wallet_modal.title: Secure your wallet
secure_your_wallet_modal.body: Now that you have value in your wallet, create password & save your wallet's seed phrase
